MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Clarkston Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have brought a generator to site but our teams are still having ongoing issues. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:45am on Saturday, 17 April 2021
